title: Caroline Nyadzayo
text:
“Imagination is the preview to lifes coming attractions” ( Albert Einstein)
📧 caroline.nyadzayo@gmail.com || 📞 (236) 335-2839 | linkedin.com/in/caroline-nyadzayo-b2b04326


📝PROFESSIONAL BIO
A seasoned marketer and effective project manager with over 15 years of experience and a proven track record of success across diverse industries, including tourism, food and beverage, advertising, and consumer goods. Caroline has a versatile skill set from franchise operations, leveraging interpersonal communication and collaborative problem solving to deliver business objectives. Currently an MBA candidate with intention to build a career in strategic consulting in Canada and Africa. She is a passionate traveler, who has traveleld across 16 countries and appreciates cultural immersion, dancing and playing golf.



🎓EDUCATION
University Canada West, Vancouver, BC MBA, Strategic Consulting | Expected September 2025
Griffith University Hotel Management & Business (Human Resources) | Graduated April 2005



🛠️KEY SKILLS

Strategic Planning
Project Management
Brand Management
Events Management
Data Visualization (Tableau)
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Digital Marketing




💼EXPERIENCE HIGHLIGHTS

Led the strategic plan and repositioning of a Coca-Cola heritage brand (Sparletta), resulting in 6% growth and reaching 8 million viewers in a PR campaign partnership with a South African TV show.
Spearheaded projects across multiple markets in Southern Africa (including Zimbabwe, South Africa, Mozambique, Zambia, Namibia, Botswana), collaborating with cross-functional franchise teams on new product developments and consumer-centric brand campaigns
Launched Cappy Delight in Mozambique becoming the No.1 in Juice brand and achieving 39.9% volume share
Led the brand relaunch of thirteen Nando’s restaurants across Zimbabwe, transitioning them from fast food outlets to casual dining experiences; also won a Coca-Cola Can Award for successful customer campaign collaboration
Steered the 2014 Zimbabwe Music Awards, overseeing artist submissions, adjudication, marketing communications, event coordination, budgeting, and sponsorship acquisition




📁 MBA PROJECTS
Consulting Practice & Capstone Strategy Project Led the development of an audit and marketing playbook to reposition a boutique consulting firm for expansion into DEI opportunities. Developed an A+ grade research report for the launch of a long term care home in British Columbia to be implemented by new business in Q4 of 2025



🎯CAREER GOALS

Short-term: Complete the Project Management Professional certification and leverage the PMI apprenticeship and mentorship program by December 2025 .
Long-term: Establish free lance consulting services in Canada as an independent consultant.
